revisions.rev:
{{wiktionarypar|hoary}} '''Hoary''' may refer to: *Hoary, [[white]] or [[grey]] with age *[[Hoary bat]], a "hairy-tailed bat" (genus Lasiurus) in the family of vesper bats (Vespertilionidae) *[[Hoary catshark]], a cat shark of the family Scyliorhinidae found in the western central Atlantic from the Leeward Islands off Antigua and Anguilla *[[Hoary Comma]], a species of butterfly, common in boreal North America *[[Hoary Fox]] (or Hoary zorro), a species of zorro (false fox) endemic to Brazil *[[Hoary-headed Grebe]], a member of the grebe family found in Australia and, since 1975, New Zealand, where it is scarce *[[Hoary Marmot]], a species of marmot that inhabits the mountains of northwest North America *Hoary Hedgehog, the codename for [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] 5.04
{{disambig}}
